references: UK vote to leave the European Union

justifications: "President Barack Obama has cautioned against 'hysteria' over the UK vote to leave the European Union."
"I do not anticipate that there is going to be major cataclysmic changes as a result of this."
"I think that the best way to think about this is, a pause button has been pressed on the project of full European integration."
"all of Europe needs to take a breath and reassess how to preserve national identity while taking advantage of political and economic integration."
